teacher_info.intro:
My name is Daria. I am from Ukraine. I am a native Ukrainian and Russian speaker. 
I speak English. 
Parlo un po’ l’italiano :)
And I study Spanish.
I like traveling, sports, cooking, snowboarding and studying languages.
I have visited more than 30 countries mostly in Europe and South America.
That’s why I like to discover other cultures and meet interesting people from different parts of the world.
I know how important practice is when you study foreign languages. So if you want to impove your Russian or Ukrainian speaking skills I would like to help you. Looking forward to your messages!
teacher_info.short_signature: Tutor with more than 1 year of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Daria. I am from Ukraine. I am a native Ukrainian and Russian speaker. 
I speak English. 
Parlo un po’ l’italiano :)
And I study Spanish.
I like traveling, sports, cooking, snowboarding and studying languages.
I have visited more than 30 countries mostly in Europe and South America.
That’s why I like to discover other cultures and meet interesting people from different parts of the world.
I know how important practice is when you study foreign languages. So if you want to impove your Russian or Ukrainian speaking skills I would like to help you. Looking forward to your messages!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am very patient and friendly. 
I am not a professional teacher but I am sure with a lot of practice everyone can speak a foreign language. 
I will do my best to help you to speak Russian without any problems.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We can discuss any topics that are interesting to you, read texts or watch russian movies.
During different russian conversations I will help you with pronunciation, vocabulary and speaking skills.

course_info.trial_description:
Trial lesson
Пробный урок.
На данном уроке мы можем познакомиться, определить ваши цели и составить план наших занятий. 
А также успеем выделить время для языковой практики.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation with native speaker
pro_course_detail.description:
! If you are complete beginner please chooce "Russian for beginners". Thank you !
Практика с носителям языка - важная часть в изучении иностранного языка. 
На этом уроке, в формате беседы, мы улучшим ваши языковые навыки, преодолеем языковой барьер и увеличим словарный запас. 
Мы можем обсуждать любые интересные для вас темы.
Жду вас на уроке ;)

This course is the best way to start speaking without fear, to improve your speaking skills and study new words.
We will discuss any topic which you like :)

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian conversation with native speaker
pro_course_detail.description:
! If you are complete beginner please chooce "Ukrainian for beginners". Thank you !

In this lesson you will have conversation with native speaker. I would like to help you improve your speaking skills. 
We can discuss any topic which you like :)

pro_course_detail.title: Reading / Чтение
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson we will read some materials which I prepare for you depending on your level.  
We will improve your pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading Ukrainian
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson we will read some materials which I prepare for you depending on your level.  
We will improve your pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Would you like to learn Russian with a native speaker? 
I am here to help you.
Learning a language with a native speaker is the best way to learn to speak it.
If you have any questions before booking the lesson feel free to ask me or book trial lesson with me.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Would you like to learn Ukrainian with a native speaker? 
I am here to help you.
Learning a language with a native speaker is the best way to learn to speak it.
If you have any questions before booking the lesson feel free to ask me or book a trial lesson with me.

teacher_info.intro:
Добрый день. Меня зовут Александр. Я живу в Москве.
Я доброжелательный человек. Всегда готов помочь в изучении французского языка.
teacher_info.introduction: J'ai terminé l'Université Linguistique de Moscou en 1992 et depuis je travaille avec les enfants et les adultes. Mes cours sont toujours basés sur la grammaire. Voilà pourquoi je sais expliquer les difficultés de la langue. En même temps mes étudiants écoutent les enregistrements et lisent des livres pour élargir leur vocabulaire et élaborer une prononciation nécessaire. Я закончил Лингвистический Университет Москвы в 1992 году и с того времени работаю с детьми и взрослыми. Я предпочитаю создать грамматическую базу для правильной речи. Параллельно мои студенты слушают аудио материалы и читают книги для расширения своего словарного запаса и постановки нормативного произношения.
teacher_info.about_me:
Добрый день. Меня зовут Александр. Я живу в Москве.
Я доброжелательный человек. Всегда готов помочь в изучении французского языка.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я работаю как преподаватель французского языка более 25 лет. Я постоянно интересуюсь новыми методиками и учебниками. 
С учениками я стараюсь подобрать те методики, которые больше подойдут для того времени, которое вы можете уделить обучению и которые вам интересны с точки зрения материала, действующих лиц и необходимого для вас объёма материала.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Мои уроки разнообразны. Я вижу необходимость комбинировать преобладание в уроке грамматического или развивающего речь материала. Многие уроки направлены и на изучение системной лексики. На каждом уроке мы уделяем внимание на произношение- ведь без него не получится певучего и красивого французского языка!!!

exp_info.description: J'ai travaillé plus que 10 ans avec les élèves de tous les âges.

cert_info.description: J'ai toujours envie de progresser et d'apprendre du nouveau surtout si ça regarde mes activités professionnelles.
cert_info.certificate: Comment faire rapidement progresser ses apprenants de manière ludique mais efficace avec les méthodes DIDIER FLE

course_info.trial_description:
Во время пробного урока я расскажу о методиках и технологиях, которые помогут развить Ваш уровень французского языка. 
Если Вы не новичок, мы почитаем и поговорим на французском языке чтобы я мог понять Ваш уровень.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammaire Niveau A1-B2
pro_course_detail.description: Изучение и систематизация грамматики начального и продвинутого уровня. Гармонизация внутри уровня, включающая умение спрягать глаголы и применять знания при построении фраз. От простой фразы- к сложной, которая может описать причину, цель, условие и т.д.

pro_course_detail.title: Практика устной и письменной речи
pro_course_detail.description: Прослушивание или просмотр аутентичного материала на французском языке с последующим переводом. Обсуждение на французском языке и написание сложных фраз (или всего материала). Необходимо иметь аккаунт Google и во время занятия пользоваться компьютером. Возможен базовый учебник.

pro_course_detail.title: Вариативный курс французского языка
pro_course_detail.description: Мы составим курс французского языка в зависимости от Ваших потребностей и пожеланий, будь то выборочные грамматические темы, либо словарные.

pro_course_detail.title: Cours Pratique de Russe (pour les français débutants)
pro_course_detail.description: En nous basant sur votre langue natale, on pourra construire des phrases pour commencer d'abord et améliorer ensuite la langue de Pouchkine et Tourguénev devenant peu à peu la vôtre.

pro_course_detail.title: Le Français en Progression
pro_course_detail.description: Composition du cours en dépendance des acquisitions et des buts de l'étudiant. Choix libre de méthode et d'activités.

pro_course_detail.title: Français pour enfants
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс французского языка для детей является основополагающим, но наиболее трудоемким. 
Мы начинаем с азов- слова, которые строятся во фразы и образуют речь!
Веселые учебники и симпатичные герои помогут нам на этом увлекательном пути!

teacher_info.intro:
I'm from Ukraine, but I currently live in Poland. I speak 7 languages: Ukrainian, Russian, English, Spanish, German, French and Polish. I have learned all these languages in a foreign language school where I worked afterwards as a teacher and translator.

I enjoy meeting new people and finding out the reasons why they want to learn a foreign language. Some learn it for business and travel, some for leisure and marriage, some- for personal growth. I also translated different documents and worked as a personal interpreter with foreigners. 

I did my study practice in a US High School, in UPNA in Spain, in SciencesPo in France, in CC in Poland and in BUW in Germany.
teacher_info.short_signature: Polyglot with international education and 6 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
I'm from Ukraine, but I currently live in Poland. I speak 7 languages: Ukrainian, Russian, English, Spanish, German, French and Polish. I have learned all these languages in a foreign language school where I worked afterwards as a teacher and translator.

I enjoy meeting new people and finding out the reasons why they want to learn a foreign language. Some learn it for business and travel, some for leisure and marriage, some- for personal growth. I also translated different documents and worked as a personal interpreter with foreigners. 

I did my study practice in a US High School, in UPNA in Spain, in SciencesPo in France, in CC in Poland and in BUW in Germany.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have taught groups of students and individual students. My youngest student was 4 years old, and my oldest was 82! I have taught all levels, from pre-beginners to advanced executive training. It is rewarding to experience my students transform their understanding of the language, achieve all necessary goals, and be really happy using their language skills. I want to find out exactly what type of help you need and create classes that can get you to your goal as quickly as possible!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
1. I make my students speak from the first lessons.
2. We read texts and discuss them.
3. I provide homework and all the necessary materials.
4. The grammar rules are explained clearly and understandably.
5. Individual approach to each student.

I teach:
EN, UA, RU: A0-C2
SP, PL: A0-B1
DE, FR: A0-A2

Please note: 
- I conduct lessons in the italki classroom by default, if you want to use another platform- inform me 2h prior to the class!
- If you want to reschedule/ cancel a class- infrom me at least 3h before the class- otherwise the class will be charged for and marked as "conducted".
- If you are running late - let me know, otherwise i will wait for 15min and mark the class as "conducted"

teacher_child_tag.full_name: Test of English as a Foreign Language

course_info.trial_description:
In this trial lesson we will focus on getting to know each other!
I will identify your goals and we will discuss the time frame of reaching them. 
I will test your current knowledge and I will personalize our future lessons according to your current skills and future goals.
We will also discuss the materials and tools which I usually use in my lessons and discuss your preferences to make your learing experience as effective as possible.

In this class you will:
- learn to make simple enquiries in speaking and writing
- build on basic grammar skills
- increase your vocabulary
- express yourself in everyday situations
- read and understand simple texts

- take part in lengthy conversations & discussions

Basically, any special request which doesn’t include a full educational process

pro_course_detail.title: Karta Polaka (Pole's Card)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is perfect for any person of any level of Polish (A0+)

The Pole's Card is a document confirming belonging to the Polish nation.
This document gives you the right to enter the territory of Poland and, therefore, the European Union. As well as the right to work and to obtain free education in Poland, discounts on museum visits and travel on the Polish railway.

An interview with the consul in Polish is a necessary step in obtaining a Pole's card.

In this course you will get all the necessary knowledge to successfully pass the interview with the consul. You will learn about the history, culture and traditions of Poland, as well as Polish language (even if you never learned Polish before).

teacher_info.intro: My name is Sabina and I have been teaching for the last 2 years. I am a native speaker of Russian, but I also speak English and Kazakh.
teacher_info.short_signature: A teacher with whom the lessons will never get boring!
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Sabina and I have been teaching for the last 2 years. I am a native speaker of Russian, but I also speak English and Kazakh.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I love teaching and connecting with my students and forming a curriculum that fits their needs. I love watching my students learn, grow, and improve their abilities as they employ the skills we work on together.
teacher_info.teaching_style: We can work on your grammar and theory, your speaking, your reading, or even your listening. We can work on each skill group using special lessons I have developed over a long time.

course_info.trial_description: During our trial lesson, we will first: identify your level, discover what you are good at, and pinpoint areas that still need work.  From here, we will carefully choose a lesson plan and course that will help you achieve your language learning goals.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian SPEAKING (old students, before 10th August)
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson will primarily focus on speaking. We will use various topics specially chosen to help you improve your communication skills. We will also focus on vocabulary that is relevant to your needs as a language learner.

pro_course_detail.title: English SPEAKING (old students, before 10th August)
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons will primarily focus on speaking, and pronunciation (American.) We will discuss a large variety of topics, improving your speech and comprehension while learning new vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: GENERAL English (A1-B2, structured lessons)
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons will primarily focus on grammar and speaking. We will discuss a large variety of topics, improve your speech and work on your grammar mistakes.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian GRAMMAR AND SPEAKING
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons will primarily focus on grammar and speaking. We will discuss a large variety of topics, improve your speech and work on your grammar mistakes.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian SPEAKING
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson will primarily focus on speaking. We will use various topics specially chosen to help you improve your communication skills. We will also focus on vocabulary that is relevant to your needs as a language learner.

pro_course_detail.title: English SPEAKING
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons will primarily focus on speaking, and pronunciation (American.) We will discuss a large variety of topics, improving your speech and comprehension while learning new vocabulary.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, I'm Artyom and I'm Russian. I've been teaching on Italki for 2 years.  I am here to help you to understand better the Russian language and culture. My main hobbies are traveling, learning foreign languages (I speak English, Spanish and Portuguese, which can also make our interaction easier) and reading books. I can describe myself as a very funny and friendly person, so, it will be very easy for you to get on with me. I was graduated from the North-Caucasus Federal University with excellence in 2017. My degree is "translation and translation studies". In 2016 I was also granted a certificate in TESOL. After studying I continue loving foreign languages and hope to learn many new ones.
teacher_info.short_signature: Hello, dear student! I teach Russian in English, Spanish and Portuguese :)
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, I'm Artyom and I'm Russian. I've been teaching on Italki for 2 years.  I am here to help you to understand better the Russian language and culture. My main hobbies are traveling, learning foreign languages (I speak English, Spanish and Portuguese, which can also make our interaction easier) and reading books. I can describe myself as a very funny and friendly person, so, it will be very easy for you to get on with me. I was graduated from the North-Caucasus Federal University with excellence in 2017. My degree is "translation and translation studies". In 2016 I was also granted a certificate in TESOL. After studying I continue loving foreign languages and hope to learn many new ones.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I started to be a tutor of English in 2017 and even today I continue doing that with success. Every time in my country and in the Internet I see more and more people who want to learn Russian for tourism, to understand our literature or just for speaking with people from Russia. Moreover, I have always had a strong desire to share my language knowledge with other people. This is the main reason why I decided to study in the TESOL program and then to give lessons of Russian on Italki. I also find teaching as a great method of cultural exchange.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I'm a very flexible person. So, together we can work out a plan which will be appropriate for you. If you want to study grammar, I will organize grammar lessons with exercises for you. If you are looking for conversational lessons, I will prepare topics in accordance with your preferences with an actual vocabulary. At my lessons I use such materials as, for example, articles, PDF, videos, audios and texts. We can also have a normal natural conversation if you have this desire. If you are a speaker of English, Spanish and Portuguese, I can explain the information you do not understand in one of these languages.

course_info.trial_description: Booking a trial lesson with me, you can estimate my way of teaching and explaining materials to decide if you would like to continue learning Russian with me or not.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian + Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: In this kind of lessons we will improve and develop both your conversational skills and your general level of Russian paying attention to the Grammar. I recommend it for people who already have at least little experience of learning Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversations
pro_course_detail.description: In this kind of lessons we will just talk about topics your prefer to make you feel more confident in speaking. We can have not only a natural conversation, but also con speak about the topics you prefer. The lesson can be accompanied by PDF, audio, video and text materials.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you just want to start learning Russian and do not know the alphabet, feel free to book this type of lessons with me. We will study also basic phrases, grammar and how to speak about various topics.

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone! I`m Mary. A Russian teacher from Moscow, Russia. When I was studying at university, I started to teach online and help our foreign students to learn Russian. I got extensive experience teaching kids and adults, one-on-one classes and group classes. Especially for teaching beginners! I could design a very interesting lesson for you. You can study basic Russian, oral Russian, exam preparation or Russian culture in my class. It`s up to you. So welcome to my class! Let`s start the journey of learning Russian!
teacher_info.short_signature: Passionate and competent teacher with over 3 years of international teaching experience=)
teacher_info.about_me: Hi everyone! I`m Mary. A Russian teacher from Moscow, Russia. When I was studying at university, I started to teach online and help our foreign students to learn Russian. I got extensive experience teaching kids and adults, one-on-one classes and group classes. Especially for teaching beginners! I could design a very interesting lesson for you. You can study basic Russian, oral Russian, exam preparation or Russian culture in my class. It`s up to you. So welcome to my class! Let`s start the journey of learning Russian!
teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher I could help you learn Russian systematically and design the course professionally for you. I`m trying to help students study in a Daily way and could use more Russian to talk and practice. No more useless books and dialogues that you will never use in your real life. Only real conversations and phrases that will make your life easier and comfortable.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Before the very first lesson, I`m definitely asking the level of language and topic that interests you. I prefer to do more speaking practice to help students review the knowledge that they have learned before. I`m sure that the more students try to speak out, the more that they learn indeed. The main rule is to feel more comfortable and relax.

course_info.trial_description: An introductory lesson for any level of student. I create a special lesson for you, based on your hobbies and interest, goals and level. Small talk and introduction session. Let me show you my style of lessons and teaching procedures.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic lesson for Beginners A1-A2
pro_course_detail.description:
Basic level. 
Russian alphabet, reading techniques, the stress in Russian words, Basic vocabulary, Greetings, Personal information, questions, numbers, nationalities, countries, main conversational topics.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for all levels
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of General course classes are based on your own interests and goals. Practice listening, reading, speaking, work on vocabulary and writing skills. We can master grammar and punctuation! 
I use my own text and files, some textbooks, audios, videos, and TV shows!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice/ Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Practice of conversation to gain fluency and increase your vocabulary. My style of teaching is more informal and conversational, then academic. So we can choose in advance any interesting topic and discuss it.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! I’m Natasha, I’m from Russia. I was born in Ulyanovsk, then moved to Moscow and now I live in Turkey (since March'22).
Learning a foreign language can be challenging sometimes but understand that the right approach can make the learning process thoroughly enjoyable!
I studied pedagogy, English, German and Methods of Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language at university and after I finished my studies I continued to learn languages. Being a teacher helps me to be a learner and being a learner myself definitely helps me to be a teacher.

I really love my native language and admire people who wish to go on this language learning journey!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! I’m Natasha, I’m from Russia. I was born in Ulyanovsk, then moved to Moscow and now I live in Turkey (since March'22).
Learning a foreign language can be challenging sometimes but understand that the right approach can make the learning process thoroughly enjoyable!
I studied pedagogy, English, German and Methods of Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language at university and after I finished my studies I continued to learn languages. Being a teacher helps me to be a learner and being a learner myself definitely helps me to be a teacher.

I really love my native language and admire people who wish to go on this language learning journey!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Having studied pedagogy as well as linguistics for 5 years I understand that the personality of a teacher and the whole atmosphere during the lesson plays a big role in achieving success in the language learning process.
It’s important to be positive, patient and focused both for a teacher and for a student.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I believe that the best results can be achieved through the integration of all aspects of language learning e.g. speaking, listening, reading, grammar, writing, vocabulary, into the learning process.
Even if your goal is to speak fluently it’s difficult to ignore the grammar or listening. You need to know how to build correct sentences and be able to understand the person you are speaking to.

cert_info.institution: Russian Language Centre Moscow State University
cert_info.certificate: Methods of Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language

course_info.trial_description:
The trial lesson is a good way to get acquainted and understand whether you like my manner of teaching or not.
It can also be a good way to discuss the further process of learning Russian and create a plan.
Let’s take this incredible opportunity!
I’m waiting for your request :)

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian (speaking, vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation)
pro_course_detail.description:
IF YOU DIDN'T FIND A FREE SLOT IN MY CALENDAR PLS SEND ME A MESSAGE
During this lesson we will work on every aspect of language learning.
This lesson is ideal for regular, more organized studying. The first lesson is to get acquainted and understand your level. I always write to a new student before the lesson to ask what their expectations are and the current level is. The more information you provide the better I'm able to help you.

We will only use certified and modern materials.
Homework is voluntary.

Suitable for complete beginners as well as for the intermediate students who want to reach the advanced level.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
IF YOU DIDN'T FIND A FREE SLOT IN MY CALENDAR PLS SEND ME A MESSAGE
During this lesson we work on your speaking skills. You can choose the topic you want to talk about , please let me know in advance, or I can give a list of topics to choose from.
Speaking practice is also about expanding your vocabulary and improving your pronunciation.
This lesson is a good opportunity to learn some real Russian and idioms.
I always provide feedback after the lesson.

Not suitable for beginners.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson the focus will be on business vocabulary and expressions. You will also learn which grammar constructions to use in formal communication and the basic etiquette rules. 
In these lessons we will look at the different spheres of business as well as the sphere in which you work or are planning to work.

This lesson is for you if 
-your company works or planning to work in the Russian market (any sphere)
-you're going to participate in business conferences in Russia
-you want to know how to benefit from partnering with Russian companies

The lessons will be based on modern course books with the addition of real-life examples taken from different media-resources.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson we will focus on typical exam tasks. We will work on reading, vocabulary and grammar, listening and especially speaking and writing skills. 
But, for example, if you can prepare for reading and grammar by yourself, our main focus can be on the other parts. 

The lessons will be based on modern course books only.

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola a todos! :) Me llamo Masha y doy clases de ruso y de español a todos. Soy de Rusia, pero actualmente vivo en España, donde doy clases durante 6 años. Me encanta el ballet, la literatura, la música clásica y enseñanza por supuesto :D
Всем привет! :) Меня зовут Маша и я даю уроки русского и испанского языков для всех желающих.Я живу в Испании, где даю уроки уже на протяжении 6 лет. Мне нравится балет, литература и классическая музыка и преподавать конечно же:D
Hello everyone :) My name is Masha and I give Russian lessons for everyone. I am from Russia, but at the moment I live in Spain, where I have been giving lessons for 5 years. I like ballet, literature and classical music.Thanks:D
teacher_info.short_signature: Spanish and Russian language tutor with 6 years' experience
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola a todos! :) Me llamo Masha y doy clases de ruso y de español a todos. Soy de Rusia, pero actualmente vivo en España, donde doy clases durante 6 años. Me encanta el ballet, la literatura, la música clásica y enseñanza por supuesto :D
Всем привет! :) Меня зовут Маша и я даю уроки русского и испанского языков для всех желающих.Я живу в Испании, где даю уроки уже на протяжении 6 лет. Мне нравится балет, литература и классическая музыка и преподавать конечно же:D
Hello everyone :) My name is Masha and I give Russian lessons for everyone. I am from Russia, but at the moment I live in Spain, where I have been giving lessons for 5 years. I like ballet, literature and classical music.Thanks:D
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Principiante, intermedio, avanzado. Doy clases a estudiantes de todos los niveles.
En las clases hablamos de libros, series de televisión y películas que recomiendo a mis alumnos. Al final es muy divertido y desarrolla la capacidad de hablar.

Beginner, intermediate, advanced. I teach students of all levels.
In lessons we talk about books, TV series and films, which I recommend to my students. After all, it's great fun and develops speaking skills.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Prefiero un estilo de enseñanza democrático. Utilizo el método de las tarjetas para que después de cada lección el alumno pueda repetir el vocabulario de forma entretenida. Siempre hay un ambiente agradable en la clase. Gracias :)

I prefer a democratic style of teaching. I use the card method so that after each lesson the student can repeat the vocabulary in an entertaining way. Always a friendly atmosphere in the lesson. Thanks :)

course_info.trial_description: This is a trial lesson. In this trial lesson, we will do a little exercises and fun games to warm up.  We will also discuss the lesson plan customized to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian / Говорим по-русски
pro_course_detail.description: This is a conversational practice lesson. In this lesson, we will talk about your favorite topics, where you will have an excellent opportunity to express your thoughts and improve your conversational skills. We will also discuss the lesson plan customized to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners / Русский язык для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we will get acquainted with the Russian language, learn new words corresponding to your level, and work on the correct pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Complete Spanish / Уроки испанского
pro_course_detail.description:
Уроки для начинающих, среднего и продвинутого уровня. Уроки испанского языка для всех уровней, вы можете практиковать свои навыки общего испанского языка со мной.

Beginner, intermediate and advanced lessons. Spanish lessons for all levels, you can practice your Spanish language skills with me.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Russian by Reading / Aprenda ruso con lectura / Читаем на русском вместе
pro_course_detail.description:
Адаптированные книги или статьи состоят из более простой, но не менее полезной для общения с носителями языка лексики. Улучшается чтение, аудирование и произношение. После каждой главы мы выполняем упражнения, которые помогут вам закрепить материал и проверить, насколько вы хорошо поняли смысл. Читая адаптированные книги или статьи, у вас не возникнет желания забросить изучение русского языка из-за неуверенности в собственных силах :)

The adapted books consist of simpler, but no less useful vocabulary for communicating with native speakers. Reading, listening and pronunciation improves. After each chapter, we do exercises to help you consolidate the material and check how well you understand the meaning. By reading the adapted books o articles, you won't feel like giving up on learning Russian because you're not sure of your abilities :)

Los libros adaptados o artículos constan de un vocabulario más sencillo, pero no por ello menos útil para comunicarse con los hablantes nativos. Se mejora la lectura, la escucha y la pronunciación. Después de cada capítulo, realizamos ejercicios para ayudarte a consolidar el material y comprobar si has entendido bien el significado. Al leer los libros adaptados o artículos, no tendrás ganas de abandonar el aprendizaje del ruso porque no estás seguro de tus capacidades :)

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Spanish by Reading / Читаем на испанском вместе
pro_course_detail.description:
Адаптированные книги состоят из более простой, но не менее полезной для общения с носителями языка лексики. Улучшается чтение, аудирование и произношение. После каждой главы мы выполняем упражнения, которые помогут вам закрепить материал и проверить, насколько вы хорошо поняли смысл. Читая адаптированные книги, у вас не возникнет желания забросить изучение испанского языка из-за неуверенности в собственных силах :)

The adapted books consist of simpler, but no less useful vocabulary for communicating with native speakers. Reading, listening and pronunciation improves. After each chapter, we do exercises to help you consolidate the material and check how well you understand the meaning. By reading the adapted books, you won't feel like giving up on learning Spanish because you're not sure of your abilities :)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Spanish / Говорим по-испански
pro_course_detail.description: This is a conversational practice lesson. In this lesson, we will talk about your favorite topics, where you will have an excellent opportunity to express your thoughts and improve your conversational skills. We will also discuss the lesson plan customized to your needs.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! Victoria here:) I've always been passionate about learning languages, and I never doubted that I would tie my life to exploring different countries and cultures! These days, I speak 5 languages, and I'm trying to learn more as I travel around the world! I would be so glad to share with you some insides about my mother tongue! That would be my contribution to the global cultural exchange:)
teacher_info.short_signature: RU & ENG🌍Passionate international teacher with over 4 years of formal experience
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! Victoria here:) I've always been passionate about learning languages, and I never doubted that I would tie my life to exploring different countries and cultures! These days, I speak 5 languages, and I'm trying to learn more as I travel around the world! I would be so glad to share with you some insides about my mother tongue! That would be my contribution to the global cultural exchange:)
teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been teaching in a formal setting since 2018: I went through a local language school and an international platform. Now I'm here, on Italki, with more than 1000 lessons behind and an accurate understanding of how to help students with various goals and levels of language proficiency.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I am convinced that the best way to learn a language is to immerse yourself in its culture, and I try to incorporate this approach in my lessons. 

During our classes, we'll use 
1) Google Classroom to keep our materials in one place
2) Notion to write down some notes taken during the class
3) Zoom, Skype or Italki Classroom as our video communication app

course_info.trial_description: During our Trial Lesson, we can discuss your goals and work out how I can help you on your learning journey

pro_course_detail.title: RU & ENG. Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Let's talk! These classes will be helpful if you want to improve your Russian \ English speaking skills or work on a specific topic vocabulary. Depending on your goal, we can just have a nice conversation or role-play a specific life situation (applying for a job, booking a hotel room, etc)

pro_course_detail.title: RU & ENG. Reading Comprehension & Pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description:
These classes will be useful if you're interested in reading in Russian \ English! We can choose a book\article, read it together, and discuss either its plot or difficult language and interesting phrasal expressions, or both!

Above all, we can certainly work with the literature you have already studied yourself. If this is your case, please let me know in advance what material you would like to work on!

pro_course_detail.title: RU & ENG. Building Grammar Skills
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson will aid you if you need help with Russian \ English grammar rules. We'll work together to master your grammar, vocabulary and orthography skills. 
For this lesson type, we'll use Google Classroom as our main learning platform, and Notion as a supporting tool to keep notes taken during our classes

pro_course_detail.title: RU & ENG. General Language Course
pro_course_detail.description: Do you want to combine everything in our course? Choose this package if you need grammar, conversation practice, writing, as well as reading and listening!

pro_course_detail.title: RU & ENG. Preparation for Exams
pro_course_detail.description: I am ready to help you prepare for international examinations as I have experience of working with students preparing for national English exams as well as IELTS and PET. Let me know if you need help specifically with an upcoming exam

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! Меня зовут Лиля, мне 34 года, я живу в России в городе Москва.
Я люблю готовить, особенно сладости, люблю заниматься йогой, учу английский и недавно увлеклась психологией. Еще я люблю гулять =)
Я очень дружелюбная и открытая, люблю людей.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет! Меня зовут Лиля, мне 34 года, я живу в России в городе Москва.
Я люблю готовить, особенно сладости, люблю заниматься йогой, учу английский и недавно увлеклась психологией. Еще я люблю гулять =)
Я очень дружелюбная и открытая, люблю людей.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я крайне увлекающаяся натура, если я за что-то берусь, то обязательно делаю это с любовью и огоньком.
teacher_info.teaching_style: На уроках очень комфортная и дружеская обстановка, я стараюсь быть другом!

course_info.trial_description: На пробном уроке мы познакомимся, я узнаю что Вам интересно, чем вы увлекаетесь и почему решили изучать русский язык. Так же мы вместе обсудим Ваши ожидания от наших классов и навыки, которые вы хотите улучшить. будет интересно =)

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description: Помогу Вам в дружелюбной обстановки разговориться, преодолеть языковой барьер, стать более уверенным в устной речи
